column5: I read a thread (see below) on a fly fishing site with the heading – “The Absolute Mother of All Fish Porn. Period” and it referred to “Sexyloops”  http://www.sexyloops.co.uk/cgi-bin/theboar...t=3726;hl=suess  Some of you may enjoy it as much as I did.  carp-starter  The original thread was ------  The Absolute Mother of All Fish Porn. Period.  Before you view this,  1 Make sure your Bookmark and Wallpaper features are working on your computer 2 Your spouse or significant other is... nearby 3 The shower is running, without hot water, should your spouse or significant other is... nearby OK, now you're ready...  Proceed...  http://www.sexyloops.co.uk/cgi-bin/theboar...t=3726;hl=suess
Awesome pictures. I'd be shaking too much to hold a camera.  Too much excitment  Joey
That was well done.  Should it bother me that I read about fish porn?  I dunno, Joey, you were all over it like a fat kid on a smartie.  Are you embarassed?
Ah, nothing wrong with a little porn now and then, especially fish porn  Joey
LOL Joey....  I'm with you....  That was awesome
OH... OH...  DANG!  All over my keyboard...  Now lookit what ya made me do..  Brilliant!  Thanx for posting.  Tight loops
